abstract: Merrill Lynch, which is facing an exodus of senior bankers in Europe, saw the back of yet-another high-profile executive Monday, as veterans of the bank are weighing an uncertain future with new owner Bank of America, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Merrill Lynch, which is facing an exodus of senior bankers in Europe, saw the back of yet-another high-profile executive Monday, as veterans of the bank are weighing an uncertain future with new owner Bank of America, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Merrill Sees Exodus of European Bankers, Report Says
